subtitle: This fruity curry includes banana and pineapple.

method.text: Drain the prawns well. Place into a large non-metallic bowl. Mix in the soured cream, garam masala and curry powder. Stir well. Cover and chill for 1-1 days.
Heat the ghee in a frying pan. Fry the cashew nuts until pale golden. Remove and drain on kitchen paper.
Stir fry the sultanas, garlic, ginger and onion for 2-3 min.
Add the prawns, banana and pineapple. Cook for 5-8 min gently. Season to taste with salt and lemon juice.

title: Prawn kashmiri
